official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to reduce the period of time that certain adverse information is retained in consumer credit files.

summary.text: Amends the Fair Credit Reporting Act to prohibit a consumer report by a consumer reporting agency from containing certain adverse information which antedates the report by more than four (currently seven) years.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to reduce the period of time that certain adverse information is retained in consumer credit files.
